name: The World Conference on Climate Change and Global Warming
content: The World Conference on Climate Change and Global Warming (CCGCONF) offers an interdisciplinary forum for the discussion of the impact of climate change and global warming in the global context. CCGCONF will feature plenary speakers by some of the world's leading innovators, researchers, and thinkers in the field. By bringing together many of the renowned scholars, the CCGCONF 2021 ensures opportunities for growth that few other conferences can compete. The conference will be hosted by Corvinus University of Budapest. on 15 - 17 October 2021\. The World Conference on Climate Change and Global Warming calls scientists, researchers, Ph.D. candidates, and engineers from the academic, scientific, engineering and industrial sectors to participate and address the various themes and topics including earth science, CO2 capture, biodiversity, food insecurity, regenerative agriculture, health consequences, and adaptability development.
